mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE store_code = #{store_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (category, product_name, unit, price, img1, img2, img3, product_explain, max_account, country, store_code, market_code) VALUES (#{category}, #{product_name}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{product_explain}, #{max_account}, #{country}, #{store_code}, 1)
INSERT INTO product_img (originalFilename, savedFilename, product_code) VALUES (#{originalFilename}, #{savedFilename}, #{product_code})
mapper.select: SELECT img1, img2, img3 FROM product WHERE product_code = #{product_code}
